title: How to Play PlayStation 2 Games on a PC Using PCSX2

steps.title: Download and install a smaller tool PCSX2[1] X Research source which is most important to run the games.
steps.content: Download and install a smaller tool PCSX2 [1] X Research source which is most important to run the games. Open the software and click Next to install.

steps.title: Now click on Start Menu on Task-Bar and you see PCSX2 Installed Click on it.
steps.content: Now click on Start Menu on Task-Bar and you see PCSX2 Installed Click on it.

steps.title: Now we have to configure the Emulator to work for PlayStation, Click on Next.
steps.content: Now we have to configure the Emulator to work for PlayStation, Click on Next.

steps.title: Here the new box appear and click on Yes.
steps.content: Here the new box appear and click on Yes.

steps.title: Now here you can't finish without getting the BIOS Image file, To get this image file you must have legal license from Sony PlayStation, Once you got it from your PlayStation provider, Insert it into the Folder that High-lighted in your document PCXS2 Folder.
steps.content: Now here you can't finish without getting the BIOS Image file, To get this image file you must have legal license from Sony PlayStation, Once you got it from your PlayStation provider, Insert it into the Folder that High-lighted in your document PCXS2 Folder. Once its done Click On Finish. Your setting at this Emulator is done.

steps.title: This Screen Appear after clicking Finish Button, Now click on CDVD to load the disk, that you inserted.
steps.content: This Screen Appear after clicking Finish Button, Now click on CDVD to load the disk, that you inserted. You can also insert the ISO file to run on it. Enjoy Playing you Games
